about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable journey in the world of Catonium, a land of medieval fantasy where ancient ruins, cities, and vast natural landscapes coexist. Uncover the riddle of Catonium before time runs out for a world broken by "The Fall," a cataclysmic event that shattered the realm just ten years ago. Navigate the complex relationships between humans, elves, and orcs in the aftermath of the cataclysm.

In this exciting new CRPG from Unspun Legends, you'll create your own unique character from five distinct classes:

Warrior: Master arms and armour to overcome enemies in melee combat.
Warden: Combine your knowledge of the natural world to track enemies and fight with finesse at range or up close.
Binder: Harness the elemental energies flowing within the Warrens to unleash devastating magics, but beware the corrupting energy of chaos.
Mender: Draw upon the powers of your faith to command divine energies, bolstering your party or condemning your foes.
Shadow: Employ stealth and trickery to surprise and swiftly dispatch those in your way.

Explore the mortal plane of Catonium and venture beyond into the elemental planes and brave the chaotic Warrens that connect them all; a labyrinthine maze of paths between the planes. Prepare yourself for the challenges that await in each unique environment as you unravel the mysteries of this immersive, original setting.

Key features

Classic RPG-inspired gameplay: Experience a game that puts gameplay first, drawing inspiration from beloved classic RPGs.
Highly customizable characters: Play your way with a wide range of customization options for your character.
Interactive world: Engage with a fully interactive world where preparation is key to overcoming various environments and challenges.
Immersive original setting: Lose yourself in the rich, detailed world of Catonium and its many planes, connected by ancient pathways known as the Warrens.

With the king missing and strange forces at work, the fate of Catonium hangs in the balance. Are you ready to shape the future of this world? Forge your own path and uncover ancient secrets. Will you become the hero that Catonium needs or embrace the Chaos?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10+
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630 / 640M or AMD Radeon HD 7450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10+
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630 / 640M or AMD Radeon HD 7450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Unravel the mysteries of Catonium, a medieval fantasy world on the brink of chaos. In the wake of "The Fall," a cataclysmic event that shattered the realm a decade ago. Ancient ruins, cities, and vast landscapes await your exploration. Forge your path, uncover secrets, and shape the future.
